query: "What were the findings of the health and social care needs assessment conducted on me on 06-08-2022?"
resource_summaries:
A completed procedure for the assessment of health and social care needs was performed on a patient at Cambridge Public Health Commission on June 8, 2022.
This record describes a completed procedure for the assessment of health and social care needs that took place on June 8, 2022, at CAMBRIDGE PUBLIC HEALTH COMMISSION.
answer: Based on the summaries provided, the findings of the health and social care needs assessment conducted on you on June 8, 2022, at Cambridge Public Health Commission indicate that a procedure for the assessment of your health and social care needs was completed on that date.
